title: Dixia Cheng Yu Yongshi: Nizhuan Zhi Lun
original_name: 地下城与勇士·逆转之轮
ending_song: "Asayake Approach (朝焼けアプローチ)" by Prima Porta (Aguri Oonishi, Mayu Sagara, Shuu Uchida, Tomoyo Takayanagi, Yukina Shutou)
sinopse:
Sequel to Arad: Suming Zhi Men.

The Japanese broadcast premiered on July 4, 2020 at 1:53 a.m. on TV Tokyo.
